title: Josh Kushner’s Thrive Capital Gains More Flexibility to Invest in Crypto, Public Stocks
sub_head: Venture firms that want to make more non-venture-like investments are registering as investment advisers with the SEC
body:
Joshua Kushner’s Thrive Capital has joined a few other venture firms in changing its regulatory status, a move that allows the firm to make more investments outside of the traditional purview of venture capital but comes with new compliance burdens.
New York-based Thrive registered as an investment adviser with the Securities and Exchange Commission in September, according to a regulatory filing.
